headline: Morgan Stanley Reiterates a Buy Rating on ConocoPhillips (COP)
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is one of the best large cap stocks to invest in for the long term. Morgan Stanley analyst Devin McDermott reiterated a Buy rating on ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) on November 20, setting a $117 price target. The rating update followed the company’s fiscal Q3 2025 earnings release on November 6, with reported earnings per […]

headline: ConocoPhillips or ExxonMobil: Which Oil Major Looks Stronger Today?
summary: XOM's integrated strength and low-cost assets contrast with COP's upstream focus as investors weigh stability versus risk.

raw.headline: ConocoPhillips or ExxonMobil: Which Oil Major Looks Stronger Today?

headline: Layoffs are piling up, raising worker anxiety. Here are some companies that have cut jobs recently
summary: It’s a tough time to be looking for a job.  Amid wider economic uncertainty, some analysts have said that businesses are at a “no-hire, no fire” standstill.  Others cite corporate restructuring more broadly — or are redirecting money to artificial intelligence.
